about.title: About Guessify
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing music education and entertainment
about.content: Learn more about our mission and team
about.story_text_1: The inspiration behind Guessify! stems from a simple truth ‚Äî we all love playing musical guessing games with our friends. Whether it's trying to name a tune from just a few seconds of audio or shouting out lyrics we recognize, these games bring people together through the joy of music. But in today‚Äôs digital age, there was no streamlined tool or app that could manage these experiences in a fun, interactive, and effortless way. That‚Äôs where Guessify! was born ‚Äî a modern solution designed to bring the magic of musical games into the tech era. With a sleek interface and smart features, Guessify! makes it easy to host, play, and enjoy music-based challenges anytime, anywhere.
about.story_text_2: Whether you're a teacher looking to engage your students, a family wanting to bond through music, or friends competing for bragging rights, Guessify! provides the perfect platform for musical discovery and fun.
about.mission_text: To make music education accessible, engaging, and enjoyable for everyone, while fostering connections through shared musical experiences.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Guessify! ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

service_description.title: 2. Description of Service
service_description.content: Guessify! is an interactive music quiz platform that allows users to create, host, and participate in music-based educational games. The service includes:
features: Music library access for educational purposes

user_accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
user_accounts.content: To access certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:
requirements: Maintain the security of your password
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptable_use.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptable_use.content: You agree not to use the Service to:
restrictions: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Harass, abuse, or harm other users
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service
Use the Service for commercial purposes without permission

intellectual_property.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Guessify! and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual_property.music_content: Music content is licensed for educational use only. Users may not download, distribute, or use music content outside of the platform.

privacy_policy.title: 6. Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices.

subscription_payment.title: 7. Subscription and Payment
subscription_payment.content: Some features of the Service require a paid subscription. By purchasing a subscription, you agree to:
terms: Pay all fees associated with your subscription
Our refund policy as stated separately

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

limitation_liability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.content: In no event shall Guessify!, its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes_terms.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes_terms.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the Service. Continued use of the Service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact_info.title: 12. Contact Information
contact_info.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
contact_info.address: Address: 123 Rothschild Blvd, Tel Aviv, Israel

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Last updated: March 1, 2024
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us

information_collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
information_collect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support.

how_we_use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
how_we_use.content: We use the information we collect to:
purposes: Track learning progress and provide analytics

information_sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
information_sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:
circumstances: To service providers who assist in our operations
When required by law or legal process
To protect our rights and safety
In connection with a business transfer

educational_data.title: 4. Educational Data Protection
educational_data.content: We are committed to protecting student privacy and comply with applicable educational privacy laws, including FERPA and COPPA.
commitments: Student data is used solely for educational purposes
We do not use student data for advertising
Schools maintain control over their student data
Parents can request access to their child's data

data_security.title: 5. Data Security
data_security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:
measures: Encryption of data in transit and at rest

your_rights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
your_rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
